thread.title: nightclub bpm update

comments.text: this new update includes a new bpm counter, revamped dj deck, and new and improved particles and effects arround the world! also slight (hopeful) performance optimizations!
new update: bpm overhaul v1.1 - added new buttons for moving the floor up/down and also added buttons on the second floor dj stand for effects! also optimized a lot!

thread.latestCommentText: new update: bpm overhaul v1.1 - added new buttons for moving the floor up/down and also added buttons on the second floor dj stand for effects! also optimized a lot!
